author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Monday announced a solatium of Rs. 1 lakh each to families of 23 persons who died in natural disasters between July and September last year.

Condolences

In a statement, Ms. Jayalalithaa expressed her condolences to the bereaved families and said the solatium would be grated from the Chief Minister’s Public Relief Fund.
title: CM announces Rs. 1 lakh solatium to 23 families
